user_instruction: 'Send Susan the proposal for the team retreat (susan@brighthorizonsms.com). You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Team Retreat Proposal

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please send me the finalized proposal for the upcoming team retreat? You can pull any supporting details from your Gmail or Notion notes as needed.

Thank you in advance for getting this over to me.

Best regards,  
Susan

final_output:
